author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...OCTAVE A LITTLE STRONGER... ...EXPECTED TO STAY OUT TO SEA OVER THE OPEN TROPICAL EASTERN PACIFIC THROUGH THE FORECAST PERIOD...
summary: ...OCTAVE A LITTLE STRONGER... ...EXPECTED TO STAY OUT TO SEA OVER THE OPEN TROPICAL EASTERN PACIFIC THROUGH THE FORECAST PERIOD... As of 2:00 PM MST Tue Sep 30 the center of Octave was located near 10.2, -113.9 with movement NW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Octave (EP5/EP152025)
